urban_camarilla.text: A watchful Camarilla coterie tails the coterie from a distance.
A tense meeting with a Primogen's ghoul courier.
An unexpected summons from a lesser Harpy.

anarch_cult.text: An ecstatic bonfire rite rages on the shoreline.
A broken mortal begs you to join 'the Dream'.
Cult enforcers watch you with painted faces.

sabbat_front.text: A Sabbat scout pack tests the edge of your domain.
You cross paths with a shovelhead 'hunting lesson'.
Whispers of a Bishop's war council in the night air.

elysium.text: Harpy gossip drips like poison in your ears.
The Keeper's assistant offers you a quiet warning.

thin_blood_industrial.text: Thin-blood chemists work a makeshift lab in a freight container.
Word spreads of a new thin-blood concoction changing hands in the rail yard.

ministry_corridor.text: A sermon about freedom and sin echoes in an empty warehouse.
Smugglers move cargo that hums with more than mundane danger.

hecata_necropolis.text: A silent funeral cortege passes through the tunnels beneath the necropolis.
Bone walls whisper old secrets to your Beast.

nosferatu_tunnels.text: A Nosferatu broker offers secrets in exchange for favors.
A partial tunnel collapse forces you to reroute through forgotten culverts.

chunnel_endgame.text: A Sabbat logistics node pulses with impending violence.
A Pentex black-ops team moves silver and UV hardware through the tunnel.
